posts.post_content: Wouldn't be nice to think that the typo was intentional? That someone other than Nicol Bolas was involved in it? Perhaps someone in the art? Someone who is so arrogant (powerful) he would NEVER allow them to call him "pathetic"?

Posted By: Existential (1/11/2013 6:55:55 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@TheWrathOfShane: Those of use playing around in the Ravnica block when this was first printed thought this was crap, and still think this is crap now. Yes it's flashy but even with mana ramp you're unlikely to do much more than a [Mind Rot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mind Rot) couldn't have done - that is to say, even if you ramp in to casting this by turn 4 or 5, you're still probably only going to make them discard 2-4 cards. For the cost and speed of this card that's still not worth it.   
  
It can be very valuable in formats like EDH against strategies like heavy card draw. But that's narrow, and the color of card draw is also the color of counterspells.

It can be very valuable in formats like EDH against strategies like heavy card draw. But that's narrow, and the color of card draw is also the color of counterspells.

posts.post_content:
The French version also has a spelling mistake in the flavor text that was corrected in the oracle text...  
  
On the card, it's written:  
*Qu'est-il advenu de ta fierté arrogan**c**e ?*  
  
And in the oracle, it was corrected:  
*Qu'est-il advenu de ta fierté arrogan**t**e ?*
posts.html:
The French version also has a spelling mistake in the flavor text that was corrected in the oracle text...

On the card, it's written:
Qu'est-il advenu de ta fierté arrogance ?

And in the oracle, it was corrected:
Qu'est-il advenu de ta fierté arrogante ?

posts.post_content:
This card is absolutely devastating when combined with mana ramp. The only thing that can stop me from blowing up your hand by turn 4 is ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol). And if you recklessly dumped your hand full of creatures out by turn 4, my [life's finale](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=life's finale) will finish you off all the same. When this resolves, people scoop. Given this cards current rating at 1.9 ((After my rating of 5)), I can safely assume that 90% of you "geniuses " started playing around M13.  
  
**Edit: With the new [Rakdos's Return](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rakdos's Return), this card is nothing in comparison. By the time you have 8 mana, return can trash 6 cards and blow up a walker, or their life. Plus you don't have to have 6 mana to use the return.**

posts.post_content:
I think this card is meant to be linked flavor-wise to [Omniscience](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Omniscience): How do you stop someone who can cast everything for free? Strip them of things to cast. Plus, compare the artworks. Jace is all "WOW this is awesome!" and then Bolas shows up and ruins his fun.  
  
(Of course, in reality the Wit's End gets mana leak'd because of its stupid high cost, but y'know)
